item.title: Day 43
item.description: More Functional Patterns Guards A way of evaluating many truth statements separately. This is an alternative way of using case statements, although this method uses otherwise which is ideal for handling bottoms. Bottoms - a non-value used to denote that the program cannot return a value or result. avgGrade :: (Fractional a, Ord a) => a -> Char avgGrade x | y>=0.9 ='A' | y>=0.8 ='B' | y>=0.7 ='C' | y >= 0.
